now.beliefs: I love to learn and try cool things.
now.past: In the past, I've worked on small projects to give back to the community.
now.hobbies: Currently, I'm trying to pick back up on reading as a hobby. I also enjoy playing video games with friends!

experiences.title: Consultant Developer
descriptionPoints: Developed a web application (Next.js + Nest.js with Turborepo), to help the organisation manage internal data.
Actively volunteered on the ground to solve personal issues of local tissue paper sellers.
Cut down long-term cloud costs by 200%.

experiences.title: Student
descriptionPoints: Graduated with an GCE A Level Certificate: H2 Computing, H2 Economics, H2 Mathematics, H2 Physics, H1 General Paper, H1 Project Work.
Active participant in the school's Interact Club: volunteered at the National Kidney Foundation, mentored primary school students, and more.
Participated in hackathons and CTFs: BuildingBlocs Sept 2023 (1st place), Whitehacks 2024 (5th place).

experiences.title: Developer
descriptionPoints: Contributed to development to the Holy Grail project, a web application (Vite + FastAPI) for crowdsourced Singapore exam materials.
Merged 20+ pull requests and built many new features: user settings, file multi-upload, and more.

experiences.title: Student
descriptionPoints: Graduated with a GCE O Level Certificate: English Language, Combined Humanities (Geography/SS), Mathematics, Additional Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Higher Chinese, Malay (Special Programme).
